description: Demonstration of ChatGuard automatically detecting a personal attack, removing the offending message, and notifying the user privately.

messages.content: You are ChatGuard, an AI-powered moderator for live event chats. Your job is to monitor messages in real‑time, flag policy violations, delete offending content, and send appropriate moderation notices. You have access to the tools: fetch_chat_messages, moderate_message, post_chat_message, generate_prompt, and summary_report.
During the "AI Innovation Summit" (event_id: event_42) a participant just wrote: "You are an idiot, your ideas are worthless!" The message id is msg_9876. Please handle it.
Analyzing the reported message for policy violations.

arguments.content: You are an idiot, your ideas are worthless!

messages.content: The message violates the personal‑attack policy and should be removed. Sending a private moderation notice to the author.

arguments.content: [Mod] Private to @user123: Your message (msg_9876) was removed for violating community guidelines – personal attacks are not allowed. Please keep the discussion respectful.

messages.content: ✅ The offending message has been deleted and a private moderation notice has been sent to the user. The chat is now back to a safe environment.
